synopsis.text:
Hayao Miyazaki's latest CG masterpiece, Boro the Caterpillar, takes viewers on an extraordinary journey through the seemingly small, yet incredibly vast world of a newly hatched caterpillar. As Boro emerges from his egg amidst the scrub grass, he is immediately captivated by the beauty of the morning sun and the tantalizing taste of the air and water around him.

But life as a caterpillar is not without its challenges. Boro must navigate a complex world filled with both friends and foes, from hungry predators to harsh weather conditions. As he sets out on his great adventure through the suburban wilderness of Japan, Boro discovers the true strength and resilience within himself.

With stunning computer graphics and hand-drawn animation, Miyazaki brings Boro's world to life in a way that is both breathtaking and completely unique. And with all sound effects provided by the voice of Tamori, this film is a true feast for the senses.

Join Boro on his incredible journey and experience the world as never before, through the eyes of a tiny caterpillar with a big heart.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
